messages.content: facerestore_cf is a custom node in ComfyUI that can be used to restore faces in images, similar to the face restore option in AUTOMATIC1111 webui.
How is facerestore_cf different from the original facerestore custom node?
facerestore_cf is a copy of the original facerestore custom node with a slight modification to support the CodeFormer Fidelity parameter.
How can facerestore_cf be installed in ComfyUI?
To install facerestore_cf, git clone the node to the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' folder using the command: 'git clone https://github.com/mav-rik/facerestore_cf.git'.
What should Windows users do if they are not running the portable version of ComfyUI?
Windows users not running the portable version of ComfyUI can run install.bat to install facerestore_cf.
What should Linux and Mac users do to install facerestore_cf?
Linux and Mac users can run install.sh to install facerestore_cf.
Where should the face restoration models be placed after downloading?
The downloaded face restoration models should be placed in the 'models/facerestore_models' directory.
What is the purpose of face detection models in facerestore_cf?
The face detection models are used to send a crop of each face found to the face restoration model, as the face restoration model only works with cropped face images.
